title: Bangla Natural Language Processing: A Comprehensive Analysis of Classical, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning Based Methods

sections.iii-b preprocessing:
The general and most used preprocessing techniques in text data that are used in Natural language processing are Tokenization , , Removal of Noise and Outliers , Lower Casing , Removal of Stop Words , Integration of Raw data , Text Stemming [ref]61, Dimensionality Reduction, Text Lemmatization , Parts of Speech Tagging , Removal of HTML tags , Removal of URLs , Spelling Correction , Removal of Emoticons [ref]105, Removing Punctuations or Special Characters 9, Removing Frequent words , Removing of Rare words , Removing Single Characters , Removing Extra Whitespaces , Removal of Numerical Values 9, Removing Alphabets , Data Compression
0, Converting Emojis to Words 1, Converting Numbers to Words 2, Text Normalization 3 , Text Standardization 4, Poping Wh-type Words , Anaphora , Verb Processing 5, Synonym Words Processing 6, N-gram
Stemming 7 and many more. The general and most used preprocessing techniques on speech data in Natural Language processing are Noise Removal 89, Pre-emphasis 0, Hamming Window , Segmentation , Sampling 1, Phoneme Mapping 3, Speech Coding , Stemming without Noise Removal 2, Voice Activity Detection 3, Framing 4 and many more.
